content:
The goal of the OpenCovid19 initiative as a program is to collectively develop open-source and low-cost tools and methodologies that are safe and easy to use to fight the Covid19 Pandemic

http://app.jogl.io/program/opencovid19

JOGL - Just One Giant Lab
JOGL helps sync humanity onto solving our most important social & environmental problems using open science, responsible innovation & continuous learning.
